cause.description:
Medina Children's home in Medina Tx helps children from dysfunctinoal families to build values and grow their own potential.
Medina is a beautiful hill country town where kids can forget about drug and family problems and focus on education and personal growth.
Donate through Aaron Harris at 903.436.1530 or visit medinachildrenshome.com
1. To Increase Interest in MCH
cause.name: Medina Children's Home
